fields.summary: CLI: Build and Adhoc packaging commands throw longjohn error if the project directory and output directory have read only access
fields.environment:
Tested on: 
1. Mac OSX Yosemite 10.10
2. Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.1.201410281743
3. Titanium SDK, build:  3.5.0.v20141210144440
4. Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.1
5. Alloy: 1.5.1
6. Xcode 6.1
7. iOS SDK 8.1
8. iPhone 5s with iOS 8.1
